reviewText: This is an amazingly educational DVD - great instruction! Covers musical expression for any musician regardless of their instrument. Show's you the difference between poor muzak and great music. How to interpret and stylize tunes. Gives you an idea of what it must be like to attend a great school like Berklee. The best music instruction I've ever heard - HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
This is a great tool in helping you develop your own jazz style.....helping you to mold your own sound, build solos, and define your jazz voice on any instrument.
